entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 3 cm north of Port Hope Simpson. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
